name: forgy-platform
description: Plataforma Forgy - App de Ejercicios con Prisma ORM

scripts.db:start: cd forgy_backend_api && docker compose up postgres -d
scripts.db:restart: npm run db:stop && npm run db:start
scripts.db:logs: cd forgy_backend_api && docker compose logs -f postgres
scripts.docker:restart: npm run docker:down && npm run docker:up
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:start && npm run wait-db && npm run prisma:setup && npm run migrate:data
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd forgy_backend_api && npm install && cd ../forgy_mobile_app && npm install && cd ..
scripts.prisma:setup: cd forgy_backend_api && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd forgy_backend_api && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.clean: npx rimraf node_modules package-lock.json forgy_backend_api/node_modules forgy_backend_api/package-lock.json forgy_backend_api/dist forgy_mobile_app/node_modules forgy_mobile_app/package-lock.json
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all
